bibl.title: Pindar "Paean" VIIIA, the "Cassandra" of Bacchylides and the Anonymous "Cassandra" in P. Oxy. 2368: An Exploration in Lyric Structure.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XXIII, 2368 (= Pack2 183). The paper aims to set out what we know about these poems and to explore the hypothesis that they are examples of the same lyric type and that they can be used to illuminate each other.
RUTHERFORD Ian, Pindar "Paean" VIIIA, the "Cassandra" of Bacchylides and the Anonymous "Cassandra" in P. Oxy. 2368: An Exploration in Lyric Structure.
